name: Neon Space (itch) (Adrián Botana Pérez)
description:
Dodge every asteroid in the galaxy to survive! 

You are in control of a spaceship by tilting your phone, try to reach the end on the galaxy. 

The game uses the accelerometro of your phone so this game can't be played on an emulator.

I highly recomend to donwload it from Google Play and all support will be wellcome. Thanks for playing.
